feed.title: Today I Learned - @rsletta
feed.subtitle: A reference of stuff I've picked up along the way

entry.title: Install GitHub CLI
entry.content:
Manual Install

Get Version

VERSION=`curl  "https://api.github.com/repos/cli/cli/releases/latest" | grep '"tag_name"' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/' | cut -c2-` 
echo $VERSION

Download latest version

With wget

wget https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/download/v${VERSION}/gh_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz

With curl

curl -sSL https://github.com/cli/cli/releases/download/v${VERSION}/gh_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz -o gh_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz

Extract downloaded file

tar xvf gh_${VERSION}_linux_amd64.tar.gz

Copy to /usr/local/bin

sudo cp gh_${VERSION}_linux_amd64/bin/gh /usr/local/bin/

entry.title: SAP GUI for Java - Connection strings
entry.content:
The way you define a new SAP Connection in SAP GUI For Java differs slightly from SAP GUI For Windows. Let’s assume that you have the following connection information:

Address: 10.1.3.40 System No: 02 In SAP GUI For Java, you need to get to the “Advanced” tab, click “Expert mode” and enter the following connection string:

conn=/H/10.1.3.40/S/3202

Obviously, the address goes between /H/ and /S/ and the system number goes to the end of the string. If your system ID is 00, you need to enter 3200. If your system ID is 07, you need to enter 3207. In our case, your system ID is 02 so you need to enter 3202.

entry.title: Certificate error in HXE Web IDE logs
entry.content:
• Enter HXE container
  • Logon to XSA CLI with command xs login
XSA reset-certificate

entry.title: Change user password in HANA Express
entry.content:
hdbsql -i 90 -d systemdb -u SYSTEM

alter user XSA_DEV password <new password>;

entry.title: jQuery-Electron fix
entry.content:
When using Electron and UI5, there are som issues with loading jQuery. Fix this using the following snippet:

<!-- Insert this line above script imports  -->
<script>if (typeof module === 'object') {window.module = module; module = undefined;}</script>

<!-- normal script imports etc  -->
<script id='sap-ui-bootstrap' 
    src='../resources/sap-ui-core.js'
    data-sap-ui-theme='sap_belize'  
    data-sap-ui-libs='sap.m'
    data-sap-ui-compatVersion='edge'
    data-sap-ui-bindingSyntax='complex'
    data-sap-ui-resourceroots='{
        "<namespace>": "./"
    }'
    data-sap-ui-preload='async'></script>

<!-- Insert this line after script imports -->
<script>if (window.module) module = window.module;</script>

Source: Electron: jQuery is not defined

entry.title: Deactivate batch ajax on OData model
entry.content:
Edit in manifest.json.

"models": {
    "yourModel": {
        "dataSource" : "yourDataSource",
        "settings" : {
          "useBatch" : false
        }
    }
}

entry.title: Activate OpenUI5 support assistant
entry.content: Keybind: CTRL-ALT-SHIFT-P

entry.title: Proxmox trying to acquire lock to stop VM - fix error
entry.content:
trying to acquire lock...
TASK ERROR: can't lock file '/var/lock/qemu-server/lock-<VM id>.conf' - got timeout

rm /var/lock/qemu-server/lock-<VM id>.conf

entry.title: Copy public key to remote server
entry.content: ssh-copy-id username@remote_host

entry.title: Turn of IPv6 Raspian Strech install
entry.content:
Edit /etc/sysctl.conf.

```vim net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1

Save

Modify kernel parameters

bash ~ $ sudo sysctl -p ```

entry.title: Fix DNS issues on fresh Raspian Strech install
entry.content:
Edit /etc/dhcpcd.conf.

static domainnameservers=1.1.1.1 1.0.0.1 208.69.38.205 8.8.8.8

entry.title: Install NVM with Homebrew
entry.content:
• Install NVM brew install nvm

  • Add NVM folder mkdir ~/.nvm

  • Add config to .bashprofile export NVMDIR="$HOME/.nvm" . "/usr/local/opt/nvm/nvm.sh"

entry.title: Manage multiple Docker instances using Portainer agent
entry.content:
Run instance of portainer agent on docker instance

docker run -d -p 9001:9001 --name portainer_agent --restart=always -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v /var/lib/docker/volumes:/var/lib/docker/volumes portainer/agent

Configure endpoint in Portainer on management instance

entry.title: Keyboard identified wrong
entry.content:
If the keyboard has been identified wrong, for example ISO kb as ANSI kb

sudo rm /Library/Preferences/com.apple.keyboardtype.plist

Reboot - Use keybord assistant

entry.title: Rewrite commit author in Git repo
entry.content:
#!/bin/sh

git filter-branch --env-filter '

OLD_EMAIL="Wrong user e-mail"
CORRECT_NAME="User name"
CORRECT_EMAIL="User e-mail"

if [ "$GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL" = "$OLD_EMAIL" ]
then
    export GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="$CORRECT_NAME"
    export GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="$CORRECT_EMAIL"
fi
if [ "$GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL" = "$OLD_EMAIL" ]
then
    export GIT_AUTHOR_NAME="$CORRECT_NAME"
    export GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL="$CORRECT_EMAIL"
fi
' --tag-name-filter cat -- --branches --tags

entry.title: Enable 2FA and access github repo
entry.content: When 2FA is enabled, one must create a personal access token, and use that as password. Remote repo must be on HTTPS, not SSH. Using two-factor authentication with the command line

entry.title: Fix commit author with git amend
entry.content: git commit --amend --author="Author Name <email@address.com>"

entry.title: Extract git commit messages since <commit>
entry.content:
To quickly get list of events. Usefull for release notes etc.

git log --format=%B <commit hash>..HEAD > filename.ext

entry.title: PlantUML icons
entry.content:
• PlantUML Office
  • Cloudinsight PlantUML sprites
  • Open Iconic
  • Material Design
  • AWS PlantUML

Examples

Default (Open Iconic)

@startuml
listopeniconic
@enduml

Devicons / Font-awesome

@startuml

' Include common to use icon macros.
!include <devicons/common>
' Include icon from Devicons.
!include <devicons/github>
' Include icon from Font Awesome icons.
!include <font-awesome/gitlab>

' Use macros from common library.
' First argument is alias, second label.
DEV_GITHUB(github, 'Github')
FA_GITLAB(gitlab, 'Gitlab')

' Use ~ to escape #
github -> gitlab : ~#movingtogitlab

@enduml

entry.title: Install PlantUML
entry.content:
macOS:

 brew install plantuml
